name: I-ChingorBookofChanges
0:
”Alexa, ask I Ching to cast a hexagram.”
”Alexa, ask I Ching to give me a quick reading.”
”Alexa, ask I Ching what do the yarrow stalks say?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: i ching
des:
The I Ching, or Book of Changes, is an ancient divination text and the oldest of the Chinese classics. Possessing a history of more than two and a half millennia of commentary and interpretation, the I Ching is an influential text read throughout the world, providing inspiration to the worlds of religion, psychoanalysis, business, literature, and art. 

Ask Alexa to cast a reading and she will use a software emulation to build your hexagram line by line, sorting variables into East and West piles with precise fidelity to the ancient yarrow stalk method. Readings for the changing lines are included.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
